  Element has no title attribute
  Element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>

  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: <button title="Godta" aria-label="Godta" class="message-component message-button no-children focusable acceptButton start-focus sp_choice_type_11" style="opacity: 1; padding: 10px 15px; margin: 10px; border-width: 0px; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-radius: 5px; border-style: solid; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; background: rgb(24, 144, 255); width: calc(100% - 50px);">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.24 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #1890ff, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
